title: Hijacking and Murder in Global Shipping’s Grim Underbelly

media:group.media:title: Hijacking and Murder in Global Shipping’s Grim Underbelly
media:group.media:description:
In July 2011, the oil tanker Brillante Virtuoso was drifting through the treacherous Gulf of Aden when a crew of pirates attacked and set her ablaze. When David Mockett, a maritime surveyor, inspected the vessel, he was left with more questions than answers. Soon after his inspection, Mockett was killed in a car bombing. 

Storylines follows Bloomberg reporters as they uncover some of the biggest financial crimes of the modern era. Watch more:  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqq4LnWs3olW48FfG_5s1jL_ru47Z3QGq
